participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Jessica balances her responsibilities as a teacher and mother while infusing joy into her life through music.
participant_1.background: I find that music helps me relax and focus on my studies. I am married with one child. I put on my red shoes and head out to the field to practice. My dad works for UPS. I'm terrible at math.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Curious and introspective, Michael is passionate about learning and connecting with others, despite sometimes feeling sensitive about social interactions.
participant_2.background: I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor. I work in accounting. I cannot get enough of Lindsey Stirling's music. I have a library in my house where I keep all my favorite books, but The Great Gatsby is my favorite. When people do not like my social media posts, it upsets me.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
What's up?
I'm just relaxing and listening to music.
I love music. What are you listening to?
Lindsey Stirling.
I love Lindsey Stirling! Have you seen her live?
No, I have not. I would love to see her live.
She's amazing live. I saw her in concert a few years ago and it was incredible.
I bet it was! I'm jealous.
You should definitely try to see her if she comes to your area.
I will! Thanks for the tip.
You're welcome. So, what else do you like to do?
I like to read. My favorite book is The Great Gatsby.
I love The Great Gatsby! I read it in high school and it's one of my favorites.
Me too! I love the characters and the story.
It's a classic for a reason.
I agree. So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher.
Oh, that's cool! I work in accounting.
I've heard accounting can be tough.
It can be, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is. So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to read, play video games, and watch movies.
Sounds like we have a lot in common. I like to read, play video games, and watch movies too.
That's great! We should be friends.
I'd love that
